page.title: 06Government
page.content: EXCLUDING THE NATIONAL GOVERNMENT THERE IS A 3 TIER SYSTEM OF GOVERNMENT IN OUR AREA. THE COUNTY COUNCIL IS RESPONSIBLE FOR HEALTH, EDUCATION, ROADS AND SOCIAL SERVICES. ONE COUNTY COUNCILLOR REPRESENTS THE INTERESTS OF THE PEOPLE IN OUR AREA. ELECTIONS ARE HELD EVERY 4 YEARS. RADNOR DISTRICT COUNCIL IS THE NEXT LEVEL OF GOVERNMENT. LOCALLY, THE INTERESTS OF THE PEOPLE IN OUR AREA ARE REPRESENTED BY THE NEW RADNOR WITH LLANFILANGEL-NANT-MELAN COMMUNITY COUNCIL. IT CONSISTS OF 7 ELECTED COMMUNITY COUNCILLORS, A CLERK AND ONE MEMBER OF RADNOR DISTRICT COUNCIL WHO ACTS PURELY AS AN OBSERVER AND CANNOT VOTE. THEY MEET EVERY THIRD THURSDAY OF THE MONTH. ELECTIONS ARE HELD EVERY 3 YEARS. DNUOF05000204
